body_html:
@hojonathanho You're right, embarrassing.

@ngimel If @hojonathanho is correct, it kind of looks like either (1) the test suite is wrong for dilation or (2) the underlying implementation of dilation is wrong. I wonder why CI didn't catch that; maybe it is skipping these tests for some reason.

body:
@hojonathanho You're right, embarrassing.

@ngimel If @hojonathanho is correct, it kind of looks like either (1) the test suite is wrong for dilation or (2) the underlying implementation of dilation is wrong. I wonder why CI didn't catch that; maybe it is skipping these tests for some reason.
